divs: Sighting DetailsMy father said he saw something and told us to come outside. I witnessed a bright red round object in the sky at about 7:45PM Eastern Time. The object was moving pretty slowly - even stopping at times - and then faded away. There were no strobe lights that are normally associated with aircrafts. It looked like it was a planet or a star at first; I realized it wasn't when I saw it moving. Did anyone else see something similar?
Summary: Star/planet-like object seen in the nigh sky. The object was bright red and moved very slowly and eventually faded.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Northport
There were no other sightings in Northport on or around December 24th 2011
